Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27478 affecting package libmemcached-awesome for versions less than 1.1.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-27478 affecting package libmemcached-awesome for versions less than 1.1.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libmemcached-awesome is earlier than 1.1.4-1, affected by CVE-2023-27478
